title: Relates to the transfer of certain monies
summary: Relates to the transfer of certain monies.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 2805                                                  A. 4005

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                   February 1, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN  SENATE -- A BUDGET BILL, submitted by the Governor pursuant to arti-
         cle seven of the Constitution -- read twice and ordered  printed,  and
         when printed to be committed to the Committee on Finance

       IN  ASSEMBLY  --  A  BUDGET  BILL, submitted by the Governor pursuant to
         article seven of the Constitution -- read once  and  referred  to  the
         Committee on Ways and Means

       AN  ACT  to  amend part JJ of chapter 56 of the laws of 2010 relating to
         providing for the administration of certain funds and accounts related
         to the 2010-11 budget, in relation to the transfer of certain monies

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 15 of that part entitled "Public Protection" of
    2  section  2  of  part  JJ  of  chapter 56 of the laws of 2010 relating to
    3  providing for the administration of certain funds and  accounts  related
    4  to the 2010-11 budget, is amended to read as follows:
    5    15.  [$45,000,000]  $65,000,000 from the miscellaneous special revenue
    6  fund (339), statewide public safety communications account (LZ), to  the
    7  general fund.
    8    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect immediately and shall be deemed to
    9  have been in full force and effect on and after April 1,  2010  provided
   10  that the amendments to section 2 of part JJ of chapter 56 of the laws of
   11  2010,  made  by section one of this act, shall not affect the expiration
   12  of such section and shall be deemed repealed therewith.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD12005-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend part JJ of chapter 56 of the laws of 2010 relating to providing for the administration of certain funds and accounts related to the 2010-11 budget, in relation to the transfer of certain monies
